summary: Dr. Darrell E. Lewis, an anesthesiologist, was charged with unprofessional conduct, incompetence, making false reports, misrepresentation, and drug diversion, stemming from prescribing and dispensing abnormalities and concerning behavior at a hospital. As a result, his medical license (D76104) was reprimanded and suspended for a minimum of one year, with a requirement to enroll in the Maryland Professional Rehabilitation Program.
